item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, February 18, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:

27. Watch R1 "think" with animated chains of thought (244 points | 69 comments)

29. Launch HN: Roark (YC W25) – Taking the pain out of voice AI testing (57 points | 28 comments)
